snippet.title: FANTASY LIFE i: The Girl Who Steals Time – The FLi's Makeover
snippet.description:
FANTASY LIFE i: The Girl Who Steals Time
Official site: https://www.fantasylife.jp/fli/en/ 
*The information in the video is current at the time of this video's release.
*The version shown in this video is under development and may differ from the final product in some aspects.
*The translations in this trailer are provisional and may be subject to change before release.

奇幻生活ｉ　轉圈圈的龍和偷取時間的少女
宣傳網站: https://www.fantasylife.jp/fli/en/
※宣傳網站僅支援日文、英文。
※影片中的消息皆為公開當下的資訊。
※影片展示的遊戲畫面為開發中版本，可能與正式版有所出入。
※此影片中的內容為暫譯，正式版可能會有所更動。

#FLi
#LEVEL5
